title: Missing Skin/s?
body:
So a few months back my friend mystery gifted me and I got a somewhat rare skin, Whistler Village Twitch if I recall properly, today I noticed that the skin had gone missing from the twitch skins I own and i'm just wondering what happened to it. Or did Riot remove it from game?

Thanks

replies.body: lodge a support ticket and if gets resolved post the result here
I don't think any of my other skins have been removed so that's nice. :D
